summary: Payment service p99 latency above threshold
description: CloudWatch alarm: p99 latency for payment-service exceeds 2000ms. Occurs during peak checkout hours. Need to investigate DB queries and external gateway calls.

summary: Idempotency key collision under high load
description: Duplicate payment attempts when same idempotency key used within 1s. Race condition in payment-service idempotency store.

summary: Rating API returning 500 for discount rules
description: POST /rating/quote returns 500 when discount rules contain null effective_date. Stack trace in rating-service discount engine.

summary: Discount calculation wrong for multi-tier policies
description: Premium discount not applied correctly when policy has multiple tiers. Calculation uses wrong tier index in rating-service.
Policy lookup returns outdated coverage after policy update. TTL on Redis cache may be too long or invalidation missing in policy-service.

summary: Policy lookup timeout in API gateway
description: Policy validation calls from API gateway time out after 5s. policy-service P95 latency increased to 4.2s. Check DB and dependency calls.
